imdb.plot outline: What Shall I Name This Love? is an Indian soap opera currently aired on channel STAR Plus. The show is a star-crossed love story presenting an interesting contrast of personalities entwined in a relationship swinging between love & hate. Khushi and Arnav have diametrically opposite ideologies. If Khushi believes in means, Arnav believes only in ends. Khushi's relationships are the most important to her, whereas Arnav believes all people come with a price and can be manipulated for one's benefit. As the story progresses, their love-hate relationship witnesses a series of dramatic conflicts. Arnav constantly tries to break Khushi's steadfast morals just in order to prove to himself that he can control everyone; Khushi on the other hand, always tries to follow her values & morals.
imdb.title: Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon
plot: What Shall I Name This Love? is an Indian soap opera currently aired on channel STAR Plus. The show is a star-crossed love story presenting an interesting contrast of personalities entwined in a relationship swinging between love & hate. Khushi and Arnav have diametrically opposite ideologies. If Khushi believes in means, Arnav believes only in ends. Khushi's relationships are the most important to her, whereas Arnav believes all people come with a price and can be manipulated for one's benefit. As the story progresses, their love-hate relationship witnesses a series of dramatic conflicts. Arnav constantly tries to break Khushi's steadfast morals just in order to prove to himself that he can control everyone; Khushi on the other hand, always tries to follow her values & morals.::Anonymous

What shall I name this love? It is not a Love-Hate story. It is Love and pretend to be hate story. Arnav and Khushi always express their love with the help of a emotion so called as ANGER. Both are extremely opposite in all the values and cultures yet they fall for each other. They pretend like they hate each other but originally they love each other a lot.::Arshi

What should i name this love? This show is all about love. The love for siblings,parents,god,food and yes between couples who are madly in love but not realizing it. Arnav Singh Raizada a diabetic patient who was an Atheist and only speaks with the power of money and was totally rude more with his life than others because of some bad past experience as he was an orphan and on the other hand Khushi Kumari Gupta was a Theist and her words are very sweet as jalebi, her fav sweet she too was an orphan but she lived with her aunt and uncle. They both were totally different from each other. Whenever they talk Khushi tries to make him understand that love is bigger than your money but Arnav always tries to prove that nothing is bigger than money. They both fight with each other all the time when they are close but when they are far from each other they always think about each other. And after lots of issues at time of Payal, Khushi's sister, and Akash, Arnav cousin wedding they both realize their love for each other but due to some family misunderstanding Arnav starts hating Khushi for the crime she has no done but after some dramatic episodes he realises his love again and live happily ever after. The most amazing part of this series is that if the love between partners is true then you can even feel each others presence as they do. And love can reduce anyone to anything. They hate each other so much that they can't come close to each other, But they love each other so much that they can't live without each other.

What should i name this love ? Or it can call it as can anyone name their love. This is a story between two people so much in love but not realizing it because they were the two totally different personality's who always disagree on each other's opinions. ASR an arrogant business tycoon living a tasteless life but Khushi came converts his life hell to heaven. She makes him believe in beauty of love with her sweetness and beauty. They two were confused with their own self yet not so lately they agreed on their love. And ASR makes the biggest deal of his life Khushi. Their journey was full of drama, action, romance.::Esha Gautam
